title: Remove 'Non-Alcoholic Beverages' label from Tea and Coffee categories

requirements.text: Remove the text 'Non-Alcoholic Beverages' from the display names of the Tea and Coffee categories throughout the app. These categories should appear simply as 'Tea' and 'Coffee' wherever category names are rendered (Order tab category grid, menu sections, item forms, etc.).

quotes: remove this text ( Non-Alcoholic Beverages) from tea ,coffee

acceptanceCriteria: The Tea category no longer shows 'Non-Alcoholic Beverages' anywhere in the UI.
The Coffee category no longer shows 'Non-Alcoholic Beverages' anywhere in the UI.
Both categories still appear and function correctly in the Order tab category grid.
Both categories still appear correctly in the Menu management page.
No other categories are affected by this change.

constraints: Do not rename or alter the underlying category keys/identifiers stored in the backend â€” only update the display names on the frontend.
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Changing any other category display names.
Modifying backend data or menu item records.
Any visual redesign or layout changes.
